name: supercharged
description: A comprehensive set of scripts for setting up a developer-friendly macOS environment

scripts.setup: npm run setup:profile && ./scripts/mac.sh && npm run validate
scripts.setup:profile: cp dot_files/.gitconfig $HOME && cp dot_files/.gitignore_global $HOME && cp dot_files/.tool-versions $HOME && cp dot_files/.zshrc $HOME && cp dot_files/.zprofile $HOME && cp dot_files/.tmux.conf $HOME && cp dot_files/.p10k.zsh $HOME && echo '✅ Dotfiles copied to $HOME'
scripts.validate: cd scripts && ./utils.sh validate && echo '✅ All tools validated successfully' || echo '❌ Validation failed'
